Hello World.text: Hello world, this is a test.

Technology.text: Artificial intelligence is transforming the world.

Daily Life.text: I usually wake up at seven in the morning.
Daily Life.phonetics: /aɪ ˈjuːʒuəli weɪk ʌp æt ˈsɛvən ɪn ðə ˈmɔːrnɪŋ/

Travel.text: The airport is about thirty minutes away from here.
Travel.phonetics: /ðə ˈɛrpɔːrt ɪz əˈbaʊt ˈθɜːrti ˈmɪnɪts əˈweɪ frʌm hɪr/

你好世界.phonetics: nǐ hǎo, zhè shì yí gè cè shì.

天气话题.phonetics: jīn tiān de tiān qì zhēn hǎo.

科技发展.text: 人工智能正在改变世界。
科技发展.phonetics: rén gōng zhì néng zhèng zài gǎi biàn shì jiè.

日常生活.phonetics: wǒ měi tiān zǎo shang qī diǎn qǐ chuáng.

旅行出行.text: 机场离这里大约三十分钟。
旅行出行.phonetics: jī chǎng lí zhè lǐ dà yuē sān shí fēn zhōng.
